Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.4.0-19
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-44716 affecting package application-gateway-kubernetes-ingress for versions less than 1.4.0-19. A patched version of the package is available.
